    Inspection Instruments

    For years since its establishment, Qualitech™ is the authorized and trusted distributor and service representative of Elcometer™ Coating Inspection Instruments in the Philippines. We are trusted by many companies in the industry for purchasing, acquisition and repair of Elcometer™ inspection equipments, among others.
